title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after importing again
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the new image is not displayed, and the original image remains visible.
EB: After importing a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout, the expected behavior is for the new image to be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the layout.
2. Import a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout.
3. Verify that the new image is not displayed and the original image remains visible.
